title: Ceremonial apron
description: two ties on each side: 61\" PR and 62\" PL; dark indigo, pink silk ribbon, coins, bels, metal half sphere at upper apron; two squares with cross stitch motif; tassles red and burgundy.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
